title: [1508521049] Has Pro Cycling Screwed Itself? | The GCN Show Ep. 242
description:
Episode 242 is here, where Si and Matt discuss everything cycling from pro cycling budgets to brakeless bikes, check out the new Ultegra groupset and see how our very own John Beavan got on in the Haute Route. Did he make it to the end?

asset.title: Has Pro Cycling Screwed Itself? | The GCN Show Ep. 242
asset.description:
Episode 242 is here, where Si and Matt discuss everything cycling from pro cycling budgets to brakeless bikes, check out the new Ultegra groupset and see how our very own John Beavan got on in the Haute Route. Did he make it to the end?

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/mo
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/mp

Enter the Zwift Competition here 👉  http://gcn.eu/WinwithZwift 

We've got the poll results to reveal as to why you really ride your bike. It might surprise you...

It's not been a good week for Cannondale Drapac, who have announced some budget shortages for 2018. It leads us to ask the question; has pro cycling screwed itself? Should we be looking at alternatives to ensure that our beautiful sport remains as entertaining as ever? Let us know your thoughts below.

Don't miss out on our latest update from Mark Beaumont, currently on track to smash the round the world record and three-quarters of the way through his mega cycling challenge.

Back on the pro cycling theme, we've got the latest from La Vuelta and emerging transfer news for the 2018 season. 

Congratulations to the winners of the Assos kit bundles (Lysanne Sansoucy - CAN, Nicholas Fanaras - US, Leif Justham - AU & Nura Flores - US) and to Luka Malic, the winner of the Schindelhauer Bike, Sena helmet and Cycliq light! 

Gustavo Santos wins the caption competition this week and with it a GCN Camelbak bottle. More impressive though is Contador's 10 second bike sketch, one of the best yet! 

Fancy your chances with the 🦈  Shark of Messina 🦈 ? Send us in your  Send us in your captions to be in with a chance of winning! 

And lastly we have some cool footage from State Bicycle Company in Extreme Corner. 

We also have some exciting news about fi'zi:k on the way. Watch this space... http://gcn.eu/mr

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/mq

Watch more on GCN...
Dan's AG2R La Mondiale Truck Tour 📹  http://gcn.eu/Ag2RTruck
The NEW Ultegra groupset 📹  http://gcn.eu/Ultegra-NEW

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
